title: Maintenance of Office Water Dispensers
content:
To all employees,

We would like to notify you that the office water dispensers will undergo routine maintenance this Friday. The maintenance team will check the filters, sanitize the machines, and ensure that all units are functioning properly. This work is part of our regular effort to provide clean and safe drinking water for everyone.

During maintenance hours, some dispensers may be temporarily unavailable. Signs will be posted on machines that cannot be used. Employees are encouraged to refill their bottles earlier in the day or use the dispensers located on other floors if necessary.

The maintenance is scheduled to take place between 10:00 a.m. and 2:00 p.m. on all floors. Please note that the work may cause brief interruptions, but the team will try to minimize any inconvenience.

If you notice any issues with a dispenser after the maintenance has been completed, please report it to the Facilities Department at facilities@cleanwater.com.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

questions.body: What should employees do if a dispenser is unavailable during maintenance?
choices_text: Use a dispenser on another floor
Bring their own water from home
Wait until the next business day
questions.explanation: 本文で、利用できない場合は他の階のディスペンサーを使うよう推奨されているため。
wrong_explanations: Aは正解のため誤答理由ではありません。
ボトルウォーターを配達してもらう指示は本文にないため誤り。
自宅から水を持参するような指示は本文にないため誤り。
翌営業日まで待つ必要があるとは書かれていないため誤り。
